topic.title: Couchbase passwords
topic.shortdesc: Use of passwords is an important security measure in Couchbase.

ul.li: Administrative passwords for Couchbase administrators and LDAP administrators

body.p: As a security best practice, choose passwords that are strong and periodically updated:

ul.li: Strong passwords have at least seven (7) characters, consisting of letters (upper and lower case), digits, and special characters.
Passwords are rotated periodically based on organization's requirements.

body.p: Reset any forgotten administrative passwords using the reset_password tool.
